txt.en: 'All of Urash Dâr has been overrun by Orcs, and amongst them are these demons from Utug-bûr... a monstrous evil.\n\n'The people here could use all of the help that be can managed, but I assure you it is a dangerous undertaking. I would understand if you are too frightened to help.'
Tell Galâmka <rgb=#00FF00>no</rgb>, that you are not frightened and that you wish to help the people of Urash Dâr.
Galâmka has information on the current state of Urash Dâr.
Speak with Galâmka now that he knows you are not too scared to help.

'Aha! I am glad that you are so eager to help our cause!'

Galâmka laughs.

'As I have said, there are people from all over here. If you truly wish to help, I ask that you speak with them as they could use your help as well.'
